description:
Serious warmth for keeping spirits high. The Patagonia Down Sweater Bunting Suit provides a layer of warm, windproof insulation that's great for kids who won't be generating a lot of heat when riding in a sled or baby carrier. The weather-resistant outer fabric is extremely light and has a good amount of abrasion resistance. The recycled down is a blend of goose and duck down reclaimed from down products. Quilted construction keeps the down in place.

  • Shell is windproof Pertex recycled polyester mini-ripstop with a DWR finish to keep it water-resistant
  • Lining is polyester plain weave with a DWR finish
  • Hood is lined in silky high-loft fleece
  • Insulated with high-loft recycled duck and goose down
  • Elastic at hem, hood and cuffs traps warm air
  • Fold over mitt and foot covers add extra warmth
  • Dual angled zippers make it easy to put on and take off
name: Patagonia Hi-Loft Down Sweater Bunting - Infants

value: 700 fill-power recycled goose and duck down blend
